review: I love how this little stick had transformed my tv into a smart tv! It was very easy to set up and begin using. I like how I can either use the supplied remote to control it, or the smart phone app as well. I used to mainly to stream Netflix and Amazon prime (of course!) and other videos such as vevo and YouTube. The streaming speed is very fast, even though it is located in my basement which is far from my modem. I recommend this over a chrome cast for the better interface and remote control option.
author: Andy

review: We had one Roku Streaming Stick and loved it so much we just had to have a second one for our other TV, so when the Stick went on sale for $10 less, we couldn't pass it up. We got it in and used it right away. Wonderful product and saves us tons of money by not having to subscribe to cable and satellite services. Thanks Roku! Best product out there.
